definition: long-winded/garrulous/to talk endlessly without getting to the point
in a busy and hasty manner
variant of 嘮嘮叨叨|唠唠叨叨[lao2 lao5 dao1 dao1]

sentences.english: He became garrulous after a few glasses of wine.
sentences.chinese: 他几杯酒下肚之后便唠唠叨叨说个没完。

sentences.english: Joy kept yacking (on) about the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 乔伊唠唠叨叨地聊著婚礼的事。

sentences.english: She was prating of her responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 她唠唠叨叨地傻谈责任。

sentences.english: This lawyer verbalizes and is rather tedious.
sentences.chinese: 这位律师唠唠叨叨，单调乏味。

sentences.english: His mother kept on chivvying him to get his hair cut.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲一直唠唠叨叨地催他去理发。

sentences.english: She is really a pill, spending whole day harping and complaining.
sentences.chinese: 她真烦人，整天唠唠叨叨的。

sentences.english: I wish you'd stop harping on me.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你别在我面前唠唠叨叨的。

sentences.english: She nagged at him all day long.
sentences.chinese: 她成天唠唠叨叨地找他岔子。

sentences.english: On the way back, she told me a lot of hum about.
sentences.chinese: 回来的路上，她絮絮叨叨地跟我说了很多。

sentences.english: Long-winded descriptions are the death of many good speeches.
sentences.chinese: 絮絮叨叨的长篇大论是演讲的死穴。

sentences.english: If the hen does not prate, she will not lay.
He is forever croaking about his problems.
sentences.chinese: 他老是絮絮叨叨地说她的那些问题。

sentences.english: He blabbed so much I couldn't hear the telephone.
sentences.chinese: 她唠唠叨叨，我听不清电话。

sentences.english: Listening can be more valuable than being a chatterbox.
sentences.chinese: 与其唠唠叨叨，不如多倾听。

sentences.english: She's always going on about her various illnesses.
sentences.chinese: 她老是唠唠叨叨地诉说她患的多种疾病。

sentences.english: After his marriage broke up, my manager became very philosophical.
sentences.chinese: 我的经理离婚后变得神神叨叨。

definition: to be chattersome/to talk on and on without stopping/to nag
long-winded/garrulous/to talk endlessly without getting to the point
to sound like a broken record/to prattle/to nag/to mutter
(coll.) to run off at the mouth/to jabber on
long-winded/garrulous/to talk endlessly without getting to the point
